nodes.text: The Yerdua poison-spitter was a vicious animal-plant hybrid native to Felucia in the Outer Rim Territories. They were consumed by Jungle Felucians. The vicious nature of the Jungle rancor may have been due in part to the hybrid.

In 34 ABY, Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs would use Parwan Nutricakes, fresh Yerdua plants, and several other vegetables in his Felucian Garden Spread, which was made with fresh Felucian greens and was safe for human consumption.
